item.title: Prompting Like a Pro: Crafting AI-Assisted Development Workflows
item.description: There are many ways to effectively prompt an LLM to get a good response, and the one I am sharing here is tailored for software development. These particular insights come from working with Claude Code. The tips and tricks outlined below are based on my experience and can help you improve your development workflow with LLMs—so give them a try!
